channel.title: Best way to portforward anyone? big ask :D
channel.description:
really need help on portforwarding. i bet im nearly there with putting online. but got stuck lolll. ive made an no-ip. got a source. need some codes maybe even to put online. but might have tell me where to check. And finally if u really help me out alot. i will help you or even make u admin +.
i not done one in ages thats why :p

item.title: Best way to portforward anyone? big ask :D
item.dc:creator: @adamelhaji adamelhaji
item.description:
@adamelhaji wrote:

[quote=“Zanzibar, post:3, topic:331020”]Port-forwarding is like riding a bike, you can never forget how to.

http://portforward.com ; Select your router, select a random game, follow the guide, replace the ports in the example with 43594 or 5555 or w/e you’re going to use .[/quote]

This question is already answered … He said SELECT A RANDOM GAME… look trough the posts please before asking

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to portforward anyone? big ask :D

item.title: Best way to portforward anyone? big ask :D
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

found my netgear port thing. ask sumert else.

cant get piccy but.

here first start of it –

If you do not know exactly what you are doing or are having problems, Start Here.

Welcome to our guide list for the Netgear (my code) !!. Please select the program you are forwarding ports for from the list below.

If you do not see the program you are forwarding ports for, be sure to visit our Default Guide for this router

then this underneath – and more!

1

1st SMTP Server

3

3-In-A-Bed
3CX

A

ABC
Access Remote PC
Act of War - Direct Action
Action PC Football 2006
Active Webcam
Active Worlds
Active Worlds File Transfer
Age of Conan
Age of Empires
Age of Empires II
Age of Empires III
Age of Mythology
AIM Talk
AIM Video IM
Aion
Aleph One
Alien Vs Predator 2

item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Port-forwarding is like riding a bike, you can never forget how to.

http://portforward.com ; Select your router, select a random game, follow the guide, replace the ports in the example with 43594 or 5555 or w/e you’re going to use .
